entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
